[HEADING] NYU Stern - NYU Shanghai MS Programs On Campus Info Session
[HEADING] NYU Stern – NYU Shanghai MS Programs: Application Tips | Webinar
The application for the 2025 intake is now closed. The application for the 2026 intake will open in August 2025. The Data Analytics and Business Computing Program has a single annual intake, with classes commencing in late May each year.
Application Materials*:
*For detailed requirement for each document, please refer to the Application Checklist on the left.

• Personal Information
• Academic transcripts (a four-year bachelor's degree from an accredited college or university in the U.S. or an equivalent degree from a foreign country )
• Prerequisite requirement
• Resume/CV
• One letter of recommendation
• TOEFL score (minimum 90) or IELTS score (minimum 6.5)  for non-native English speaker OR who have not received a university degree taught in English
• A personal statement

pages.title: MS in Data Analytics and Business Computing | NYU Shanghai - NYU Stern

pages.content:
[HEADING] MS in Data Analytics and Business Computing
[HEADING] Application Checklist
The application for the Summer 2025 intake is closed.
Review the entire Application Checklist section carefully before beginning the online application. Also, be sure to review the Deadline & Notification and Policies to the left before applying.
Applications for MS in Data Analytics and Business Computing are accepted for the Summer start term only.
• Pre-enrollment Requirements
• Standardized Tests
• Transcripts and Degrees
• Professional Information
• Essays
• Recommendation Letter
• International Student Supplement (if applicable)
• Application Fee
pages.title: Application Checklist | NYU Shanghai - NYU Stern

pages.content:
[HEADING] NYU Stern – NYU Shanghai MS Programs: Application Tips | Webinar
Discover how NYU Stern - NYU Shanghai's global MS programs can accelerate your career - join our live admissions webinar.Date and Time: August 22, 9:00–10:00 AM China Standard Time
August 21, 9:00–10:00 PM Eastern Time Zone
NYU Shanghai Admissions Representative will cover:
Bring your questions - we will answer them in real time
• Program highlights, U.S. and China study format, and the China - Asia business focus
• Career outcomes
• Application process
• Live Q&A + how to connect 1-on-1 with the admissions office, current students and faculty
pages.title: NYU Stern – NYU Shanghai MS Programs: Application Tips | Webinar | NYU Shanghai - NYU Stern

pages.content:
[HEADING] NYU Stern - NYU Shanghai MS Programs On Campus Info Session
NYU Stern - NYU Shanghai are jointly offering four business MS programs: MS in Data Analytics and Business Computing(MSDABC), MS in Quantitative Finance(MSQF), MS in Organization Management and Strategy(MSOMS), and MS in Marketing and Retail Science(MSMRS).
Join us on Aug 16th at 2:00 - 3:00 PM to learn more about our unique graduate business programs and admissions process.  
Event Agenda:
Event Language: English
Location:  NYU Shanghai New Bund Campus 上海纽约大学前滩校区
567 West Yangsi Road, Pudong District 杨思西路567号
从西门进入签到
Notice：
• Check in (Starting from 1:45 pm)
• Campus Tour
• MS Programs Introduction - Brief introduction regarding the uniqueness of the MS programs and the application process
• Capstone Project Introduction - Special guest: QF Program Capstone Director, Professor Han Shen Lin
• Q&A
• One-on-one consultation
• Please bring your ID for campus entry.
• Parking spaces are not provided for this event.
pages.title: NYU Stern - NYU Shanghai MS Programs On Campus Info Session | NYU Shanghai - NYU Stern

pages.content:
[HEADING] Visit Stern: Joint MS Programs Introduction & NYU Stern Campus Tour
Event: Visit Stern – MS Programs Introduction
Date: August 8, 2025
Time: 3:00 - 4:00 PM (EST)
Location: NYU Stern, Henry Kaufman Building, 50 West 4th St , New York
Join us at NYU Stern for a special summer session to learn more about NYU Stern - NYU Shanghai master’s programs:
MS in Organization Management and Strategy (OMS) / MS in Marketing and Retail Science (MRS) / MS in Quantitative Finance (QF) / MS in Data Analytics and Business Computing (DABC)
Current students from the Class of 2026 will also be in attendance to share their experiences and answer your questions.
We look forward to welcoming you on campus!
pages.title: Visit Stern: Joint MS Programs Introduction & NYU Stern Campus Tour | NYU Shanghai - NYU Stern
